i1.name: Perseverance
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Garen''' [[health regeneration|regenerates]]{{ft|{{as|{{pp|key=%|1.5+0.2*(x-1) for 6;then + 0.8*x for 7; then + 0.4*x|formula=1.3%+0.2% per level up to level 6, then+0.8% up to level 13, then+0.4%}} of his {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} every 5 seconds.|{{as|{{pp|key=%|(1.5+0.2*(x-1))/10 for 6;then + 0.8/10*x for 7; then + 0.4/10*x|formula=0.13%+0.02% per level up to level 6, then+0.08% up to level 13, then+0.04%}} of his {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.}}

'''Garen''' loses ''Perseverance'' for {{tt|8 seconds|Not a cooldown, unaffected by cooldown reduction}} if he takes damage from epic {{tip|monster|monsters}}, enemy {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, or if he is hit by an enemy [[Champion ability|ability]] or affected by an enemy [[summoner spell]], refreshing on subsequent damage or hits to '''Garen''' from them.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Garen health regenerationGaren loses Perseverance for 8 seconds if he takes damage from epic monsters, enemy turrets, or enemy champions, or if he is hit by an enemy Champion ability or affected by an enemy summoner spell, refreshing on subsequent damage or hits to Garen from them.
i1.notes: * ''Perseverance'' does not go on nor refresh its cooldown from damage which was fully prevented by a {{tip|shield}} or {{tip|invulnerability}}.

q1.name: Decisive Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}} himself of all {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for a few seconds.

Additionally, '''Garen's''' next [[basic attack]] within {{fd|4.5}} seconds becomes {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, {{tip|lunge|lunges}} at his target, deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and {{tip|silence|silences}} the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Decisive Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Garen's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Garen cleanses himself of all slows and gains 30% bonus movement speed for a few seconds.Additionally, Garen's next basic attack within 4.5 seconds becomes unstoppable, lunges at his target, deals bonus physical damage, and silences the target for 1.5 seconds.Decisive Strike resets Garen's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage does not).
** The bonus damage will also apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The bonus damage is applied to [[structures]].
* ''Decisive Strike'' locks '''Garen''' out of using basic attacks for a short period of time. This is shortened with {{stil|attack speed}}.
* The enhanced attack will still complete even if the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}} during the {{tip|attack windup}} and {{tt|applies its effects accordingly|The damage and the silence are still applied}}.
* ''Decisive Strike'' will only {{tip|cleanse}} {{tip|slow|slows}} and no other status effects (e.g. the [[damage modifier|damage reduction]] from {{si|Exhaust}} will not be removed).
** The only exception is if the {{tip|slow}} debuff has a {{tip|cripple}} effect applied by the same debuff, which will also be removed together with the ''slow'' effect; e.g. {{cai|Wither|Nasus}}.
* ''Decisive Strike'' will not prevent the reapplication of {{tip|slow|slows}} (e.g. the persistent slow from {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}} will be immediately reapplied after removal if '''Garen''' is still within its [[area of effect]]).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only negate the {{tip|silence}}.
* ''Decisive Strike's'' {{tip|lunge}} can pass very thin terrain and will otherwise not be able to. In any case, '''Garen''' will still hit his target.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 50% AD)

w1.name: Courage
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Garen''' permanently gains {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|{{fd|0.25}} '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 '''bonus''' resistances at 120 unit kills.
After reaching maximum stacks, increases {{as|'''bonus''' armor by 10%}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance by 10%}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' [[damage modifier|reduces]] incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds, '''Garen''' additionally gains a {{tip|shield}} and 60% {{tip|Tenacity}}.
w1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Garen permanently gains 0.25 bonus armor and 0.25 bonus magic resistance every time he kills an enemy, up to a maximum of 30 bonus resistances at 120 unit kills.After reaching maximum stacks, increases bonus armor by 10% and bonus magic resistance by 10%.Active: Garen damage modifier incoming damage by 30% for a few seconds. For the first 0.75 seconds, Garen additionally gains a shield and 60% Tenacity.
w1.notes:
* ''Courage's'' bonus resistances are only gained when it is ranked up at least once, but ''Courage's'' passive is retroactive for units killed before it was learned.
* {{pending for test}}: ''Courage's'' '''bonus''' resistances can be obtained by any of '''Garen's''' damage sources (basic attacks, abilities, summoner spells, item actives).
** This does not include ''last hits'' transferred to '''Garen''' artificially, through effects such as {{ii|Relic Shield|Spoils of War}}.
* The kills on these enemy unit types count towards ''Courage's'' '''bonus''' resistances:
** {{tip|champion|Champions}} ([[kill]]s and {{pending for test}}: [[assist]]s)
** All {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}}
** [[Champion summoned units]] (e.g. {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}}, {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Dark Procession|Yorick}})
** All {{tip|pet|pets}} and {{tip|clone|clones}}.
*** The bonus is equal for all these units; ''Large'' units do not grant a larger bonus.
* The kills on these enemy unit types do '''not''' count towards ''Courage's'' '''bonus''' resistances:
** {{tip|Wards}}.
** {{tip|Turrets}} (including {{ai|Shurima's Legacy|Azir|Sun Disk}}) and other [[structures]]
** [[Jungle plants]].
** Units destroyed by 'trampling' such as {{cai|Rampant Growth|Zyra|seeds}}, {{cai|Cell Division|Zac|goo}} or {{cai|Tunnel|Rek'Sai|tunnels}}.
* ''Courage'' will only grant bonus resistances from units killed by '''Garen''' himself. {{ii|Eye of the Herald}} and {{ii|Relic Shield|Spoils of War}} of allies do not count.
* The {{tip|Tenacity}} increase {{tip|stacks additively}} with the ''tenacity reduction'' from {{tip|Brittle}}, but multiplicatively with other sources.

effects.str:
• Duration:

  • Shield Strength: (+ 20% bonus health)

r1.name: Demacian Justice
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Garen''' calls upon the might of ''Demacia'' onto the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing them {{sti|{{as|true damage}}}}.
The target is {{tip|true sight|revealed}} for 1 second starting from the beginning of the cast time.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia onto the target enemy champion, dealing them true damage.The target is revealed for 1 second starting from the beginning of the cast time.
leveling: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Demacian Justice'' is cancelled and does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} under the following circumstances:
** The target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
** The target leaves {{tip|sight}} [[range]] while '''Garen''' is {{tip|nearsight|nearsighted}}.
** The target is too far away.
** The target dies.
* The target will die if they're at least under {{as|{{ap|(20 to 30)/(1+(20 to 30)/100)|round=2}}% '''maximum''' health}} + {{as|{{ap|(150 to 450)/(1+(20 to 30)/100)|round=2}} '''flat''' health}} on top of that. This does not count effects that mitigate [[true damage]], such as {{tip|shield|shields}}.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|True Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
effects.str: • True Damage: (+ % of target's missing health)
